Source: Reward for inviting Neuvillette to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Heir to the Ancient Sea's Authority
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1210]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1210] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S12101]</color> once.
After your characters trigger $[K212]: Neuvillette, who has this card equipped, deals +1 DMG for the next 2 instances.
(You must have $[A1210] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.
